\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
\subsubsection*{template$<$std\+::size\+\_\+t length$>$\newline
struct template\+\_\+str\+\_\+buffer$<$ length $>$}
Used in consteval literal operators implemented for strings, that way both the length and the contends of the string can be used with static\+\_\+assert to raise compile-\/time errors.

CYD-\/\+UI uses this type for color declaration\+:

auto c = "{}\#\+FCAE1\+E"{}\+\_\+color; // Ok auto c1 = "{}\#\+FCAE1\+Eaaaa"{}\+\_\+color; // Compile-\/time error, invalid length

\end{DoxyTemplParams}
